name: Baldi's BSODA Mayhem!
description:
(YOU CAN OPEN SWINGING DOORS NOW EVEN WHEN 0 NOTEBOOKS)

Oh Noes! Baldi and Everyone has gone crazy with BSODA! And Baldi wants you to get all seven BSODA Packs for him. But he's REALLY into the craze. So, not even i know if it will be enough to stop Baldi (for a while atleast).

CREDITS IN THE GAME
